title: Trend Micro Email Security - Mail Tracking
description: - This provides comprehensive overview of email activity, allowing you to track email messages that have passed through the system and monitor their delivery status.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This provides comprehensive overview of email activity, allowing you to track email messages that have passed through the system and monitor their delivery status.

## Widgets
1. Total Mails
2. Total Incoming Mails
3. Total Outgoing Mails
4. Mails Over Time by Direction
5. Total Accepted Mails
6. Total Blocked Mails
7. % of Blocked Mails
8. % of Blocked Mail Over Time
9. Top Actions
10. Top Blocked Reasons
11. Top 10 Senders
12. Top 10 Recipients
13. Top 10 Sender IPs
14. Top 10 Recipient IPs
15. Email Senders by Country
16. Accepted Mail Tracking Log Details
17. Blocked Mail Tracking Log Details
18. Total Size
19. Total Size of Quarantined Emails
20. Total Size of Non-Quarantined Emails
21. Size Over Time
22. Message Size by Subject
